member.name: T:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.AdministrationRegion
member.summary: Describes information about a regional election administrative area.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.AdministrationRegion.ElectionAdministrationBody
member.summary: Information about an election administrative body (e.g. County Board of Elections).

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.AdministrationRegion.Local_jurisdiction
member.summary: Describes information about a regional election administrative area.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.AdministrationRegion.Name
member.summary: The name of the jurisdiction.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.AdministrationRegion.Sources
member.summary: A list of sources for this area. If multiple sources are listed the data has been aggregated from those sources.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.AdministrativeBody
member.summary: Information about an election administrative body (e.g. County Board of Elections).

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.AdministrativeBody.AbsenteeVotingInfoUrl
member.summary: A URL provided by this administrative body for information on absentee voting.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.AdministrativeBody.BallotInfoUrl
member.summary: A URL provided by this administrative body to give contest information to the voter.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.AdministrativeBody.CorrespondenceAddress
member.summary: A simple representation of an address.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.AdministrativeBody.ElectionInfoUrl
member.summary: A URL provided by this administrative body for looking up general election information.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.AdministrativeBody.ElectionOfficials
member.summary: The election officials for this election administrative body.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.AdministrativeBody.ElectionRegistrationConfirmationUrl
member.summary: A URL provided by this administrative body for confirming that the voter is registered to vote.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.AdministrativeBody.ElectionRegistrationUrl
member.summary: A URL provided by this administrative body for looking up how to register to vote.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.AdministrativeBody.ElectionRulesUrl
member.summary: A URL provided by this administrative body describing election rules to the voter.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.AdministrativeBody.HoursOfOperation
member.summary: A description of the hours of operation for this administrative body.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.AdministrativeBody.Name
member.summary: The name of this election administrative body.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.AdministrativeBody.PhysicalAddress
member.summary: A simple representation of an address.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.AdministrativeBody.Voter_services
member.summary: A description of the services this administrative body may provide.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.AdministrativeBody.VotingLocationFinderUrl
member.summary: A URL provided by this administrative body for looking up where to vote.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.Candidate
member.summary: Information about a candidate running for elected office.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.Candidate.CandidateUrl
member.summary: The URL for the candidate's campaign web site.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.Candidate.Channels
member.summary: A list of known (social) media channels for this candidate.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.Candidate.Email
member.summary: The email address for the candidate's campaign.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.Candidate.Name
member.summary: The candidate's name.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.Candidate.OrderOnBallot
member.summary: The order the candidate appears on the ballot for this contest.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.Candidate.Party
member.summary: The full name of the party the candidate is a member of.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.Candidate.Phone
member.summary: The voice phone number for the candidate's campaign office.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.Candidate.PhotoUrl
member.summary: A URL for a photo of the candidate.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.Channel
member.summary: A social media or web channel for a candidate.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.Channel.Id
member.summary: The unique public identifier for the candidate's channel.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.Channel.Type
member.summary: The type of channel. The following is a list of types of channels, but is not exhaustive. More channel types may be added at a later time. One of: GooglePlus, YouTube, Facebook, Twitter

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.Contest
member.summary: Information about a contest that appears on a voter's ballot.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.Contest.BallotPlacement
member.summary: A number specifying the position of this contest on the voter's ballot.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.Contest.Candidates
member.summary: The candidate choices for this contest.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.Contest.District
member.summary: Describes the geographic scope of a contest.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.Contest.ElectorateSpecifications
member.summary: A description of any additional eligibility requirements for voting in this contest.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.Contest.Level
member.summary: The level of office for this contest. One of: federal, state, county, city, other

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.Contest.NumberElected
member.summary: The number of candidates that will be elected to office in this contest.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.Contest.NumberVotingFor
member.summary: The number of candidates that a voter may vote for in this contest.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.Contest.Office
member.summary: The name of the office for this contest.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.Contest.PrimaryParty
member.summary: If this is a partisan election, the name of the party it is for.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.Contest.ReferendumSubtitle
member.summary: A brief description of the referendum. This field is only populated for contests of type 'Referendum'.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.Contest.ReferendumTitle
member.summary: The title of the referendum. (e.g. 'Proposition 42') This field is only populated for contests of type 'Referendum'.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.Contest.ReferendumUrl
member.summary: A link the referendum. This field is only populated for contests of type 'Referendum'.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.Contest.Sources
member.summary: A list of sources for this contest. If multiple sources are listed, the data has been aggregated from those sources.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.Contest.Special
member.summary: "Yes" or "No" depending on whether this a contest being held outside the normal election cycle.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.Contest.Type
member.summary: The type of contest. Usually this will be 'General', 'Primary', or 'Run-off' for contests with candidates. For referenda this will be 'Referendum'.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.Election
member.summary: Information about the election that was queried.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.Election.ElectionDay
member.summary: Day of the election in YYYY-MM-DD format.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.Election.Id
member.summary: The unique ID of this election.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.Election.Name
member.summary: A displayable name for the election.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.ElectionOfficial
member.summary: Information about individual election officials.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.ElectionOfficial.EmailAddress
member.summary: The email address of the election official.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.ElectionOfficial.FaxNumber
member.summary: The fax number of the election official.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.ElectionOfficial.Name
member.summary: The full name of the election official.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.ElectionOfficial.OfficePhoneNumber
member.summary: The office phone number of the election official.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.ElectionOfficial.Title
member.summary: The title of the election official.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.ElectionsQueryResponse
member.summary: The list of elections available for this version of the API.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.ElectionsQueryResponse.Elections
member.summary: A list of available elections

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.ElectionsQueryResponse.Kind
member.summary: The kind, fixed to "civicinfo#electionsQueryResponse".

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.ElectoralDistrict
member.summary: Describes the geographic scope of a contest.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.ElectoralDistrict.Id
member.summary: An identifier for this district, relative to its scope. For example, the 34th State Senate district would have id "34" and a scope of stateUpper.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.ElectoralDistrict.Name
member.summary: The name of the district.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.ElectoralDistrict.Scope
member.summary: The geographic scope of this district. If unspecified the district's geography is not known. One of: statewide, congressional, stateUpper, stateLower, countywide, judicial, schoolBoard, cityWide, special

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.PollingLocation
member.summary: A location where a voter can vote. This may be an early vote site or an election day voting location.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.PollingLocation.Address
member.summary: A simple representation of an address.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.PollingLocation.EndDate
member.summary: The last date that this early vote site may be used. This field is not populated for polling locations.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.PollingLocation.Name
member.summary: The name of the early vote site. This field is not populated for polling locations.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.PollingLocation.Notes
member.summary: Notes about this location (e.g. accessibility ramp or entrance to use)

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.PollingLocation.PollingHours
member.summary: A description of when this location is open.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.PollingLocation.Sources
member.summary: A list of sources for this location. If multiple sources are listed the data has been aggregated from those sources.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.PollingLocation.StartDate
member.summary: The first date that this early vote site may be used. This field is not populated for polling locations.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.PollingLocation.VoterServices
member.summary: The services provided by this early vote site. This field is not populated for polling locations.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.SimpleAddressType
member.summary: A simple representation of an address.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.SimpleAddressType.City
member.summary: The city or town for the address.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.SimpleAddressType.Line1
member.summary: The street name and number of this address.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.SimpleAddressType.Line2
member.summary: The second line the address, if needed.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.SimpleAddressType.Line3
member.summary: The third line of the address, if needed.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.SimpleAddressType.LocationName
member.summary: The name of the location.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.SimpleAddressType.State
member.summary: The US two letter state abbreviation of the address.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.SimpleAddressType.Zip
member.summary: The US Postal Zip Code of the address.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.Source
member.summary: Contains information about the data source for the element containing it.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.Source.Name
member.summary: The name of the data source.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.Source.Official
member.summary: Whether this data comes from an official government source.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.VoterInfoRequest
member.summary: A request for information about a voter.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.VoterInfoRequest.Address
member.summary: The registered address of the voter to look up.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.VoterInfoResponse
member.summary: The result of a voter info lookup query.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.VoterInfoResponse.Contests
member.summary: Contests that will appear on the voter's ballot

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.VoterInfoResponse.EarlyVoteSites
member.summary: Locations where the voter is eligible to vote early, prior to election day

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.VoterInfoResponse.Election
member.summary: Information about the election that was queried.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.VoterInfoResponse.Kind
member.summary: The kind, fixed to "civicinfo#voterInfoResponse".

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.VoterInfoResponse.NormalizedInput
member.summary: A simple representation of an address.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.VoterInfoResponse.PollingLocations
member.summary: Locations where the voter is eligible to vote on election day. For states with mail-in voting only, these locations will be nearby drop box locations. Drop box locations are free to the voter and may be used instead of placing the ballot in the mail.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.VoterInfoResponse.State
member.summary: Local Election Information for the state that the voter votes in. For the US, there will only be one element in this array.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.VoterInfoResponse.Status
member.summary: The result of the request. One of: success, noStreetSegmentFound, addressUnparseable, noAddressParameter, multipleStreetSegmentsFound, electionOver, electionUnknown, internalLookupFailure

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.CivicinfoService.Key
member.summary: Sets the API-Key (or DeveloperKey) which this service uses for all requests

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.ElectionsResource.ElectionQuery
member.summary: List of available elections to query.

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.ElectionsResource.VoterInfoQuery(Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.Data.VoterInfoRequest,System.String)
member.summary: Looks up information relevant to a voter based on the voter's registered address.
member.param: Required - The unique ID of the election to look up. A list of election IDs can be obtained at.https://www.googleapis.com/civicinfo/{version}/elections

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.ElectionsResource.ElectionQueryRequest.Oauth_token
member.summary: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.ElectionsResource.ElectionQueryRequest.PrettyPrint
member.summary: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.ElectionsResource.VoterInfoQueryRequest.Oauth_token
member.summary: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.ElectionsResource.VoterInfoQueryRequest.PrettyPrint
member.summary: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.ElectionsResource.VoterInfoQueryRequest.ElectionId
member.summary: The unique ID of the election to look up. A list of election IDs can be obtained at.https://www.googleapis.com/civicinfo/{version}/elections

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.ElectionsResource.VoterInfoQueryRequest.OfficialOnly
member.summary: If set to true, only data from official state sources will be returned.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Civicinfo.us_v1.ElectionsResource.VoterInfoQueryRequest.Body
member.summary: Gets/Sets the Body of this Request.
